content: **size ** centerpiece measures about 22 inches 55 9 cm in diameter **materials ** j & p coats or clark s o n t best six cord mercerized crochet size 30 small ball j & p coats - 6 balls of white or ecru or 7 balls of any color *or* clark s o n t - 9 balls of while or ecru or 11 balls of any color steel crochet hook no 10 this pattern is called pineapple doily in *pineapple crochet designs* and is on page 35 *there is another doily called pineapple centerpiece found in book no 230 and pineapple crochet designs ed rita weiss*
